prompts.oDataSourceTooltip: Select the OData service you want to replace
prompts.oDataSourceURITooltip: Enter the URI for the new OData source. The URI should start and end with '/' and should not contain any whitespaces or parameters
prompts.maxAgeTooltip: (Optional) Enter the time in seconds it takes for a cached response of the service to expire.
prompts.oDataAnnotationSourceURITooltip: Server side annotations have been detected for the selected OData service. If needed, enter new annotation data source URI for the changed service. The URI should start and end with '/' and should not contain any whitespaces or parameters
prompts.filePathTooltip: Select the annotation file from your workspace
prompts.addAnnotationOdataSourceTooltip: Select the OData service you want to add annotation file to
prompts.oDataServiceNameTooltip: Enter a name for the OData service you want to add
prompts.oDataServiceUriTooltip: Enter the URI for the OData service you want to add. The URI should start and end with '/' and should not contain any whitespaces or parameters
prompts.oDataServiceVersionTooltip: Select the version of OData of the service you want to add
prompts.oDataServiceModelNameTooltip: Enter a name for the SAPUI5 model you want to use from the service
prompts.oDataServiceModelSettingsTooltip: If needed enter any additional model settings in the "key1":"value1","key2":"value2" format
prompts.oDataAnnotationDataSourceNameTooltip: Enter a name for the OData annotation data source
prompts.oDataAnnotationDataSourceUriTooltip: Enter URI for the OData annotation data source. The URI should start and end with '/' and should not contain any whitespaces or parameters
prompts.oDataAnnotationSettingsTooltip: If needed enter any additional {{value}} settings in the "key1":"value1","key2":"value2" format

component.usageIdTooltip: Enter the component usage ID you want to add
component.nameTooltip: Enter the name of the component you want to add
component.isLazyTooltip: Select if the component should be lazy or not
component.tooltip: If needed enter any additional {{input}} in the  "key1":"value1","key2":"value2" format
component.shouldAddLibraryLabel: Do you want to add library reference?
component.shouldAddLibraryTooltip: Choose if you want to add library reference
component.libraryIsLazyTooltip: Choose if you want the library reference to be lazy or not

prompts.title: Title
prompts.subtitle: Subtitle

tooltips.title: Enter title for your FLP configuration
tooltips.subtitle: Enter subtitle for your FLP configuration
tooltips.icon: Enter icon path for your FLP configuration

validators.missingIconOrTitleOrSubtitle: At least one of Title, Subtitle and Icon should have a value.
validators.annotationFileAlreadyExists: There is already an annotation file with the same name, please choose another file or rename the file and select it again
validators.errorDuplicatedValueOData: OData Annotation or OData Service with the same name was already added to the project
validators.errorDuplicatedValueSapui5Model: SAPUI5 Model with the same name was already added to the project
validators.errorDuplicateValueComponentId: Component usage with the same name was already added to the project
validators.errorDuplicateValueLibrary: Library with the same name was already added to the project
validators.errorDuplicateNamesOData: OData Service Name must be different from OData Annotation Data Source Name
validators.errorCustomerEmptyValue: {{value}} should contain at least one character in addition to '{{prefix}}'
validators.errorInvalidDataSourceURI: Invalid URI. Should start and end with '/' and contain no spaces
